00003 #include <fstream>
00004 #include "RmSettings.h"
00005 #include "RmPioneerController.h"
00006 
00007 RmSettings::RmSettings()
00008 {
00009         // Initialization of settings not saved to file
00010         SettingsName = "settings.dat";
00011         EnabledSonars = new bool[RmPioneerController::NumSonars];
00012         for ( int i = 0; i < RmPioneerController::NumSonars; ++i ) EnabledSonars[i] = true;
00013 
00014         // Attempt init via file
00015         if ( !read() ) 
00016         {
00017                 init();
00018         }
00019         else {
00020                 std::string iv = invalids();
00021                 if ( iv.length() > 0 ) {
00022                         std::cerr << "Settings file contains invalid data for:\n" << iv << "Using default values.\n\n";
00023                         init();
00024                 }
00025         }
00026 }
00027 
00028 
00029 RmSettings::~RmSettings()
00030 {
00031         // not called in dll mode
00032         delete[] EnabledSonars;
00033 }

00035 
00036 void RmSettings::init()
00037 {
00038         RegionIHalfwidth = 100;
00039         SonarModel = RmUtility::SingleCell;
00040 
00041         LocalMapDistance = 5000;
00042         CellSize = 100;
00043         PreRotate = false;
00044         MaxCollectionDistance = 100;
00045         MaxCollectionDegrees = 5;
00046 
00047         Beta = 15;
00048         AlphaFactor = 1.0f;
00049         MaxOccupied = 0.98f;
00050         MaxEmpty = 1.0f;
00051         OutOfRangeConversion = 1500;
00052         IgnoreOutOfRange = true;
00053         IgnoreObstructed = true;
00054 
00055         Localize = false;
00056         MotionModel.MinHeight = 0;
00057         MotionModel.MinWidth = 15;
00058         MotionModel.UnitDistance = 500;
00059         MotionModel.UnitTurn = 10;
00060         MotionModel.GaussianSigma = 5.0f;
00061         MotionModel.BendFactor = 1.0f;
00062         ObstructedCertainty = 0.7f;
00063 
00064         GridName = "";
00065         SonarName = "";
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 bool RmSettings::read()
00070 {
00071         std::ifstream is( SettingsName.c_str() );
00072         if ( is ) {
00073                 is >> RegionIHalfwidth;
00074                 int sonarModel;
00075                 is >> sonarModel;
00076                 SonarModel = (RmUtility::SonarModelEnum)sonarModel;
00077                 is >> LocalMapDistance;
00078                 is >> CellSize;
00079                 is >> MaxCollectionDistance;
00080                 is >> MaxCollectionDegrees;
00081                 is >> PreRotate;
00082                 is >> Beta;
00083                 is >> AlphaFactor;
00084                 is >> MaxOccupied;
00085                 is >> MaxEmpty;
00086                 is >> OutOfRangeConversion;
00087                 is >> IgnoreOutOfRange;
00088                 is >> IgnoreObstructed;
00089                 is >> Localize;
00090                 is >> MotionModel.MinHeight;
00091                 is >> MotionModel.MinWidth;
00092                 is >> MotionModel.UnitDistance;
00093                 is >> MotionModel.UnitTurn;
00094                 is >> MotionModel.GaussianSigma;
00095                 is >> MotionModel.BendFactor;
00096                 is >> ObstructedCertainty;
00097                 is >> GridName;
00098                 is >> SonarName;
00099                 is.close();
00100                 return true;
00101         }
00102         return false;
00103 }

00105 
00106 std::string RmSettings::invalids()
00107 {
00108         const std::string pre = " - ";
00109         const std::string post = "\n";
00110         std::string invalids;
00111 
00112         if ( RegionIHalfwidth < 10 ) invalids += pre + "RegionIHalfwidth " + post;
00113         if ( SonarModel != RmUtility::SingleCell && SonarModel != RmUtility::AcousticAxis && 
00114                 SonarModel != RmUtility::Cone ) invalids += pre + "SonarModel " + post;
00115         if ( LocalMapDistance < 100 ) invalids += pre + "LocalMapDistance " + post;
00116         if ( CellSize < 1 ) invalids += pre + "CellSize " + post;
00117         if ( MaxCollectionDistance < 1 ) invalids += pre + "MaxCollectionDistance " + post;
00118         if ( MaxCollectionDegrees < 1 ) invalids += pre + "MaxCollectionDegrees " + post;
00119         if ( Beta < 7 || Beta > 90 ) invalids += pre + "Beta " + post;
00120         if ( AlphaFactor <= 0.0 ) invalids += pre + "AlphaFactor " + post;
00121         if ( MaxOccupied <= 0.0 || MaxOccupied >= 1.0 ) invalids += pre + "MaxOccupied " + post;
00122         if ( MaxEmpty <= 0.0 || MaxOccupied >= 1.0 ) invalids += pre + "MaxEmpty " + post;
00123         if ( OutOfRangeConversion < 1 ) invalids += pre + "OutOfRangeConversion " + post;
00124         if ( MotionModel.MinHeight < 0 ) invalids += pre + "MotionModel.MinHeight " + post;
00125         if ( MotionModel.MinWidth < 0 ) invalids += pre + "MotionModel.MinWidth " + post;
00126         if ( MotionModel.UnitDistance < 1 ) invalids += pre + "MotionModel.UnitDistance " + post;
00127         if ( MotionModel.UnitTurn < 1 ) invalids += pre + "MotionModel.UnitTurn " + post;
00128         if ( MotionModel.GaussianSigma <= 0.0 ) invalids += pre + "MotionModel.GaussianSigma " + post;
00129         if ( fabs( MotionModel.BendFactor ) > 20.0  ) invalids += pre + "MotionModel.BendFactor " + post;
00130         if ( ObstructedCertainty < 0.0 || ObstructedCertainty > 1.0 ) {
00131                 invalids += pre + "ObstructedCertainty " + post;
00132         }
00133         if ( GridName.length() == 0 ) invalids += pre + "GridName " + post;
00134 
00135         return invalids;
00136 }

00139 void RmSettings::write()
00140 {
00141         std::ofstream os( SettingsName.c_str() );
00142         if ( os ) {
00143                 os << RegionIHalfwidth << " ";
00144                 os << SonarModel << " ";
00145                 os << LocalMapDistance << " ";
00146                 os << CellSize << " ";
00147                 os << MaxCollectionDistance << " ";
00148                 os << MaxCollectionDegrees << " ";
00149                 os << PreRotate << " ";
00150                 os << Beta << " ";
00151                 os << AlphaFactor << " ";
00152                 os << MaxOccupied << " ";
00153                 os << MaxEmpty << " ";
00154                 os << OutOfRangeConversion << " ";
00155                 os << IgnoreOutOfRange << " ";
00156                 os << IgnoreObstructed << " ";
00157                 os << Localize << " ";
00158                 os << MotionModel.MinHeight << " ";
00159                 os << MotionModel.MinWidth << " ";
00160                 os << MotionModel.UnitDistance << " ";
00161                 os << MotionModel.UnitTurn << " ";
00162                 os << MotionModel.GaussianSigma << " ";
00163                 os << MotionModel.BendFactor << " ";
00164                 os << ObstructedCertainty << " ";
00165                 os << GridName << " ";
00166                 os << SonarName;
00167         }
00168         os.close();
00169 }

00172 std::ostream& RmSettings::put( std::ostream& os, std::string prefix ) const
00173 {
00174         os << prefix << "RegionIHalfwidth " << RegionIHalfwidth << "\n";
00175         os << prefix << "SonarModel " << SonarModel << "\n";
00176         os << prefix << "LocalMapDistance " << LocalMapDistance << "\n";
00177         os << prefix << "CellSize " << CellSize << "\n";
00178         os << prefix << "MaxCollectionDistance " << MaxCollectionDistance << "\n";
00179         os << prefix << "MaxCollectionDegrees " << MaxCollectionDegrees << "\n";
00180         os << prefix << "PreRotate " << PreRotate << "\n";
00181         os << prefix << "Beta " << Beta << "\n";
00182         os << prefix << "AlphaFactor " << AlphaFactor << "\n";
00183         os << prefix << "MaxOccupied " << MaxOccupied << "\n";
00184         os << prefix << "MaxEmpty " << MaxEmpty << "\n";
00185         os << prefix << "OutOfRangeConversion " << OutOfRangeConversion << "\n";
00186         os << prefix << "IgnoreOutOfRange " << IgnoreOutOfRange << "\n";
00187         os << prefix << "IgnoreObstructed " << IgnoreObstructed << "\n";
00188         os << prefix << "Localize " << Localize << "\n";
00189         os << prefix << "MotionModel.MinHeight " << MotionModel.MinHeight << "\n";
00190         os << prefix << "MotionModel.MinWidth " << MotionModel.MinWidth << "\n";
00191         os << prefix << "MotionModel.UnitDistance " << MotionModel.UnitDistance << "\n";
00192         os << prefix << "MotionModel.UnitTurn " << MotionModel.UnitTurn << "\n";
00193         os << prefix << "MotionModel.GaussianSigma " << MotionModel.GaussianSigma << "\n";
00194         os << prefix << "MotionModel.BendFactor " << MotionModel.BendFactor << "\n";
00195         os << prefix << "ObstructedCertainty " << ObstructedCertainty << "\n";
00196         os << prefix << "GridName " << GridName << "\n";
00197         os << prefix << "SonarName " << SonarName << "\n";
00198         return os;
00199 }
